qas.question: In what year did SCA buy CBS Records?
Who was the biggest artist that CBS had?
How much did SCA pay for CBS Records?

context: On <b5_0>November 17, <a0_0>1987<b5_0/><a0_0/>, SCA acquired CBS Records, which hosted such acts as <a1_0>Michael Jackson<a1_0/>, for <b6_0>US<a2_0>$2 billion<b6_0/><a2_0/>. <b7_0>CBS Inc<b7_0/>., now CBS Corporation, retained the rights to the CBS name for music recordings but granted Sony a temporary license to use the CBS name. <b8_0>CBS Corporation<b8_0/> founded a new CBS Records in <a3_0><b9_0>2006<b9_0/><a3_0/>, which is distributed by <a4_0>Sony through its RED subsidiary<a4_0/>.
